0011000010111011 0000101010000001 0 -> sum: 0011101100111100, cout: 0
1011001111001110 1000000101110011 0 -> sum: 0011010101000001, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
